Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: BritH
Reviews.Content: This camera is very lightweight and easy to use. I chose this because I wanted a camera that would take unique pictures using 35mm film. To be honest - I was a little disappointed in how normal the prints were. All around it is a good toy camera to add to your collection

Reviews.Title: fun camera
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline Franks
Reviews.Content: This little camera is not only very easy to use, it takes great shots! Probably in the category of a "toy" camera, it delivers.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: franky
Reviews.Content: I love this camera...i've owned it for a few months and IT IS AWESOME!!! In my opinion, way easier to use than a Holga. Film is readily available.Its lightweight and kinda cheap looking, but it's cute.

Reviews.Title: Good toy camera
Reviews.Author: Jamey
Reviews.Content: It's hit or miss with this camera but that is the case with all toy cams.  I would suggest not using this camera indoors as I have had only bad experiences doing that.  I have had the best luck just using standard 400 speed film. I usually go to Flickr and look up the camera I'm considering buying to check out the kinds of photos it takes.
